content.raw:
Sure. I utilized the tf static publisher and published an additional transform between base\_link and my odom frame. In a launch file, it will look something like this:  

```
<node pkg="tf2_ros" type="static_transform_publisher" name="enu_ned_broadcast" 
            args="0 0 0 3.14 0 -1.57 map base_link" />
```

following syntax 

```
static_transform_publisher x y z yaw pitch roll frame_id child_frame_id
```

from [http://wiki.ros.org/tf2\_ros](http://wiki.ros.org/tf2_ros). It seems to have worked, although I am not sure if it is the most optimal solution.
